scripts.build: npm run copyprotos && tsc && npm run binplace && tslint 'cmd/**/*.ts' 'lib/**/*.ts'
scripts.binplacetestdata: mkdir -p bin/tests/langhost/cases/ && find tests/langhost/cases/* -type d -exec cp -R {} bin/tests/langhost/cases/ \;
scripts.binplace: npm run binplaceprotos && npm run binplacetestdata
scripts.test: npm run cov && npm run covreport
scripts.covreport: istanbul report text-summary && istanbul report text
